targets.rawSql:
SELECT time,ST_X(ST_AsEWKT(location)) AS longitude,
       ST_Y(ST_AsEWKT(location)) AS latitude
FROM location_info
WHERE (ST_X(ST_AsEWKT(location)) <> 0) AND (ST_Y(ST_AsEWKT(location)) <> 0)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
        |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "vehicle/1/realtime")
                    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_voltage")
targets.rawSql: SELECT time,voltage from battery_info WHERE $__timeFilter(time)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
        |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "vehicle/1/realtime")
                    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_kmh")
targets.rawSql: SELECT speed_kmh FROM general_info WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '10 seconds' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
